text.quote: 000: Clause 4, page 4, line 24, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “( ) available housing options, and the choice of providers, available in the authority’s area,”

text.quote: 000: Clause 5, page 5, line 19, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “( ) the importance of ensuring adults with needs for care and support have access to suitable living accommodation;”
